targets.expression:
fields event_details.env as env1
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.metricType='TTFB' or event_details.metricType='RESOURCE') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] 
|stats COALESCE(count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss),0) as cachemiss,COALESCE(count(event_details.sthcdncachehit),0) as cachehit by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,env1
|display event_timestamp,env1,cachehit/(cachehit+cachemiss)

filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and (event_details.initiatorType="navigation" or event_details.initiatorType="script" or event_details.initiatorType="link" ) and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by event_details.env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,compression

fields concat(event_details.env,'-',metadata.countryCode) as env
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as pageViews by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,env
|sort pageViews desc

fields concat(event_details.env,'-Global') as env
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}]
|stats count() as pageViews by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,env

filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize by event_details.env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,transferSize

fields concat(event_details.env,'-',metadata.deviceType) as env
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as deviceCount by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,env,metadata.countryCode
|display event_timestamp,env,deviceCount

panels.title: Page Views by Devices by environment: ${country}

targets.expression:
filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.sthcdndownstreamfblduration,${percentile}) as originFBL by event_details.env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,originFBL

panels.title: CloudFront to Origin FBL by environment : ${country}

targets.expression:
filter event_type='cdn_metrics' 
|filter event_details.metricType='RESOURCE' or event_details.metricType='TTFB' 
|filter event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}]  and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count(event_details.sthcdncachehit) as cachehit,count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss) as cachemiss,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by event_details.sthbehavior as behavior,event_details.env
|display behavior,event_details.env,chr
|sort behavior

filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize, count() as totalRequests by event_details.env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,transferSize/totalRequests

fields event_details.env as env
|filter event_details.metricType='TTFB' and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.connectionTime,90) as connecttime by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,connecttime

targets.rawSQL: select sc_status,count(*) from rtlogs2 where dt between '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD-HH}' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD-HH}' and sc_status!='200' and c_country in (${country:singlequote}) group by sc_status;

targets.expression:
fields metadata.countryCode as countryCode
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation'
|filter countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as edgePageViews by bin(5m) as event_timestmap,event_details.sthcdnpop

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as totalBytes by event_details.sthcdnpop as PoP
|display PoP,totalBytes
|sort totalBytes desc
|limit 10

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}]
|stats count() as totalRequests by event_details.sthcdnpop as PoP
|display PoP,totalRequests
|sort totalBytes desc
|limit 10

fields event_details.env as env1
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='navigation') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] 
|stats COALESCE(count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss),0) as cachemiss,COALESCE(count(event_details.sthcdncachehit),0) as cachehit by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,env1
|display event_timestamp,env1,cachehit/(cachehit+cachemiss)

filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and (event_details.initiatorType="navigation") and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by event_details.env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,compression

filter event_details.metricType='FCP'and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.value,90) as fcp by event_details.metricType,event_details.env,bin(1m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,fcp

filter event_details.metricType='LCP' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.value,90) as lcp by event_details.metricType,event_details.env,bin(1m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,lcp

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize, count() as totalRequests by event_details.env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,transferSize/totalRequests

fields event_details.env as env
|filter event_details.metricType='TTFB' and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.value,90) as ttfb by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,ttfb
